name: Experiment Glob
description:
Description

This is my final project for my Rapid Prototyping class. The idea was to make a game about this blob whose gravity changes based on which surface it’s in contact with. The mechanic was interesting and I feel the game demonstrates the idea quite well. So here’s the short puzzle game that I made. It turned out to be sort of… creepy.

Time

3 Weeks

Music
Deus Ex: Human Revolution OST – Hengsha Sewer Ambient

Developed In
Game Maker
